name: GetWebhookEventDeliveries
description:
Retrieve webhook deliveries for an organization.

Call this tool to get a list of webhook deliveries for a specific webhook configured in a GitHub organization. It is useful for monitoring and debugging webhook events.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: webhook_hook_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the webhook in the organization.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of webhook deliveries to be returned per page (maximum 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: pagination_start_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor to indicate the starting delivery for fetching the page of deliveries. Useful for pagination purposes.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

parameters.name: include_redeliveries
parameters.description: Indicate whether to include repeated webhook deliveries in the results. Set to true to include.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: hook_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
